metadata.title: CVE-2019-14850 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A denial of service vulnerability was discovered in nbdkit 1.12.7, 1.14.1and 1.15.1. An attacker could connect to the nbdkit service and cause it toperform a large amount of work in initializing backend plugins, by simplyopening a connection to the service. This vulnerability could causeresource consumption and degradation of service in nbdkit, depending on theplugins configured on the server-side.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nbdkit - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
nbdkit-plugin-guestfs - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
nbdkit-plugin-libvirt - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
nbdkit-plugin-lua - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
nbdkit-plugin-perl - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
nbdkit-plugin-python - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
nbdkit-plugin-ruby - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
nbdkit-plugin-tcl - 1.24.1-2ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nbdkit package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.24.1-2ubuntu4').
